content.question: Based on the excerpt, the most likely purpose of Dickinsonâ€™s letters was to

choices.label: use Enlightenment rhetoric to encourage American autonomy
support efforts to claim the French territory of Louisiana
argue for increased industrial production in the colonies

content.answer: use Enlightenment rhetoric to encourage American autonomy

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
